description: Koneko accidentally has her personality reversed magically, making her incredibly sexually active and reversing her sexual preference. The episode closes when Issei arrives to the clubroom late to find Koneko has taken Rias & Asia into the shower without him.

titles.title: Koneko Goes a Little Over the Top...Meow
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 3: Koneko, Chotto Daitan... Nyan
妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.3 ~小猫,ちょっと大胆......にゃん~
